title: T206 HOF action pose lot of 15 sold
author: drdduet

posts.post_title: T206 HOF action pose lot of 15 sold
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is one great lot of 15 different T206 HOFers.  They include--
Bresnahan with bat
Evers Chicago on shirt
Duffy bat
Griffith bat
Jennings one hand
Baker
Lajoie with bat
Matty black hat
Johnson pitch
Keeler with bat
Crawford throwing
Bender no trees
Joss pitch
Brown Chicago on shirt
Evers Cubs on shirt

For scans and inquiries email to [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url].  First to commit to the lot via my email gets it--as per my usual.  Price for lot is $1300. sold
